title: Defensive Publication: Bamboo Perimeter/Wind-Sunbreak System for Hemp
description:
A reproducible “living perimeter” method using clumping bamboo shelterbelts around hemp fields to moderate wind and sun, reduce lodging and evapotranspiration, and increase yield stability in North Texas (USDA 8a/8b). Includes belt geometry, species selection, containment, irrigation, soil program, and MRV protocol; with plan-view and cross-section figures.
